name: ROBLOX Obby?
description:
Hello,

The below is a feedback form to submit your opinions. It asks for a lot of sort sentence answers and one or two long answers with a rating lines too. 

https://forms.gle/32pGpYQMw2dGLnCM6

Thanks for playing!

Controls

WASD & Arrow Keys - Movement (forwards, left, back, right)

Spacebar - Jump 

P & R (might change to one) - Reset/restart 

Esc/L - Lock/unlock mouse (May not work in the HTML version)
